productionSqlExpression: SELECT  LTRIM(RTRIM(department)) AS dept, COUNT(*) AS service_order_count FROM oe_line_service_ud WHERE department IN ( N'Assembly') GROUP BY LTRIM(RTRIM(department)) ORDER BY service_order_count DESC;
calculationType: Calculate service order count for Assembly department.

calculationType: Calculate service order count for Repair department.
